description: A notebook computer is a battery- or AC-powered personal computer generally smaller than a briefcase that can easily be transported and conveniently used in temporary spaces such as on airplanes, in libraries, temporary offices, and at meetings.
A laptop computer is a small personal computer whice is use for office work. They are designed to be more portable than traditional desktop computers.

A gaming laptop is a small and mobile personal computer, which has its own built-in screen and is specifically designed to enable gaming on the move and in spaces where you don't have access to a desk.
